General.Name: Korla Pear
General.Description: Tongyi Carbon Neutral Technology (Xinjiang) Co., Ltd engages in the planting, refrigeration, storage, research and development, processing, and sale of agricultural products in China. It offers Korla fragrant pears, Turpan raisins, Xinjiang red dates, almonds, figs, and other Xinjiang specialty fruits. The company sells its products under Oriental Sacred Fruit and Sayidong brands. The company was formerly known as Xinjiang Korla Pear Co.,Ltd. Tongyi Carbon Neutral Technology (Xinjiang) Co., Ltd was incorporated in 1999 and is based in Korla, China.
